EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Executive Dinner at CF Summit_Boston_Q218.Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us at the Pivotal & Microsoft Executive Dinner!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for being a part of the Cloud-Native Roadshow in Boston. We hope our event provided you with a clear perspective on the process and technology it takes to become a cloud-native organization.
We have made the presentation slides available for you:
- Item 1 <[[link1]]> - Item 2 <[[link2]]>
If you are interested in having Pivotal present cloud-native content to your organization or want to learn more about Pivotal, contact us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a follow up with our team.
Thank you again for joining us! The Pivotal Team
